android.car.hardware

类 CarHvacFanDirection

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.car.hardware.CarHvacFanDirection

  • public final class CarHvacFanDirection
extends java.lang.Object
    CarHvacFanDirection is an abstraction for car's fan directions.

    VehiclePropertyIds.HVAC_FAN_DIRECTION and VehiclePropertyIds.HVAC_FAN_DIRECTION_AVAILABLE use constants in CarHvacFanDirection as their property value. Developers can compare the property value with constants in this class to know which fan direction is used in cars.

      Constant for defrost and floor direction.

      Constant for face direction.

      Constant for face and floor direction.

      Constant for floor direction.
      static int UNKNOWN
      Constant for unknown fan direction.
